title: New Hampshire holds electric vehicle relay
text:
COLEBROOK, N.H. (AP) - New Hampshire is holding an electric vehicle relay from Colebrook to Portsmouth.

The relay, scheduled Monday, will feature the latest electric vehicle models driven by Gov. Chris Sununu, Common Man founder Alex Ray, Howie Wemyss of the Mt. Washington Auto Road, and others.

New Hampshire has a growing proportion of electric vehicle drivers as residents and tourists.

___
